definition: variant of 勾心鬥角|勾心斗角[gou1 xin1 dou4 jiao3]
to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
angle/corner/horn/horn-shaped/unit of money equal to 0.1 yuan, or 10 cents (a dime)/CL:個|个[ge4]
role (theater)/to compete/ancient three legged wine vessel/third note of pentatonic scale

sentences.english: If children live with jealousy, they learn what envy is.
sentences.chinese: 在嫉妒中成長的孩子，學會鉤心鬥角。

sentences.english: It's an usual rivalry between brother and sister.
sentences.chinese: 那是兄妹之間常見的鉤心鬥角。

sentences.english: Like all misers he had a constant need to pit his wit against those of other men.
sentences.chinese: 象所有的守財奴一樣，他常跟人家鉤心鬥角。

sentences.english: The young heroine steps into a web of intrigue in the academic world.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的女主人公陷入了學術界鉤心鬥角的羅網之中。
